reviews.review:
Смешно или грустно, но в моей истории покупок сказано: Куплено: 29 июн. 2014 в 18:48 Portal 2 - 99 pуб.
Сегодня я её прошел до конца. 5,5 лет я играл понемногу, уставал, забрасывал и возвращался.
Она намного длиннее первой, которую я прошел на одном дыхании за пару дней и местами казалась мне однообразной, но всё же игра сделана с огромной любовью, продумана, "вылизана". Неподражаемый юмор, неподражаемая озвучка, потрясающий финал. Кубик с намеком (!!) Безусловно рекомендую как уже теперь классику и как игру с одной из самых необычных механик, игру которая заставляет думать, радоваться решениям и улыбаться, по-настоящему интересную игру.
this game has an epic and interesting story with awesome characters to meet and interact with
Очень хорошая игра, почти прошел сюжет, он кстати очень интересен!) Советую к покупке!!
Best game ever coop ans solo
Portal 2 ist eine wunderbare Fortsetzung des ersten Teiles. Besonders gefällt mir, dass es zum Nachdenken und kreativ werden anregt.
很适合拿去给小朋友玩，开发空间想象和思考能力，已经安利了好几个小朋友了
uif i had a portal gun i would put a portal to Ray Sisms house and i would kill him

I've heard this game a long long time ago, but finally bought it and played it and it's just as good as people describe it as, fun and it takes a lot of brain cells to do some crazy stuffs, and most importantly, you can play this with your friends which could potentially get both of you mad at each other, but, like I said earlier, it is an absolutely amazing game and definitely worth playing!

Uno de los mejores juegos de puzzles que he jugado. La narrativa cómica te lleva junto con los puzzles, los cuáles no son ni tan exasperantes ni tan fáciles.
Cuenta además con un modo cooperativo que se hace muy divertido; Si tenés amigos, claro.
Además de todo esto el juego tiene el workshop con mapas creados por la comunidad, lo cuál lo hace, "prácticamente", infinito.
Si todo esto no convence, viene con un editor propio para hacer tus propias cámaras de prueba y desafiar al resto de la comunidad.
Todo sea por la ciencia!
if the portal gun was real could you suck your robot friend off from a long ways away?

they should make a portal 3 cause its 2020 and think of all the stuff they can do now with a portal 3 portal 4 they can continue the story forever and if they are planing on doing it at least try to get  the og actors or someone who sounds ike them

roses are red
violets are blue
portal 3
is never coming through
Я понимал как это сложно, но не настолько что я немог нормально проходить уровни. Спасибо Гейбу за спаленный игровой стул.
Шедевр но зная вентель ждать 3 час стоит очень не скоро а то и вообще не будет наверное)
Great singleplayer campaign, awesome co-op one too. Definitely worth a buy.
Wonderful game and sequal, highly recommend :)
Это же портал, о чем тут еще говорить
Great storytelling, nice puzzles. Would probably confuse the shit out of me when it came out.
i think yes beacause it is fun and you need to think alot so yes i would recommend this for other players
Muito bom o game, o segundo melhor franquia de jogo da valve.

Another fun game. Not quite as charming as the first, but a pleasant addition to an already enjoyable premise. My only recommendation is to play the original Portal first, as the story unfolds nicely in chronological order.
The best game ever, an absolute masterpiece. Extra points for the level builder.
Неплохо, но если улучшить, было бы лучше
Best adventure/action/transportation game I ever played. Though it isn't the BEST quality, it is still amazing (gameplay matters more than graphics, btw)!
he和弟弟一起玩，很有意思的解密
интереснейшие головоломки, как в соло так и в пати игре, к соло игре прилагается робот унижающий тебя морально и орально, 11 "ты чудовище" из 10
真的很好玩（主角长什么样？）
ジャガイモに罵倒されるゲームです。プレイしていて腹が立ちました。
很不错的双人合作益智游戏！单人的可玩性会下降很多，创意工坊好评！
сюжет прикольный концовка мне очень понравилось

This game is amazing! So hard and complex.

SPOILER: It's a game about a core named GLaDOS and a personality core named Wheatly, who fight who should own the facility.

el juego es muy bueno , no se como no lo jugue antes . es un juego de pensar poco o bastante , depende la persona , a mi ya me hizo pensar en los primeros niveles , los graficos son exelentes , pero no es lo que importa , si no los puzzles que ofrece , muy recomendado
깨는 게 정말 어렵지만 엔딩에 그만한 가치가 있던 게임....
juegazo original... ambientación, música, sonidos, historia... estupendos... un must.
Melhor puzzle que eu já comprei melhor ainda em multyplayer

It's a really good game, and older but a classic. This is actually the third time I've played through it. There's a lot of great atmospheric storytelling, a couple twists, and the puzzles are challenging but fun. I haven't played a lot in co-op mode, but I've heard that it's good! Would recommend a play through.
Great game, i definately got my money's worth.

This game has its jokes and its charm, it's really great and how they introduce new mechanics is very clever. I love the adaptive music in this game especially. I like it how they make certain actions play a tune along with the music that is playing where your at, Portal is known for its good adaptive music.
This game was my whole childhood, if u like puzzle this game is perfect and not too hard with a really nice story.

1. oyuna göre en az 2 kat daha geliştirilmiş bir mekanik var oyunda. Hikaye genişletilmiş ve Half-Life 2 ile aynı zaman dilimind egeçiyor hikaye. 1. oyunda olduğu gibi gene bazı puzzle odaları kafayı yedirtse de gerçekten aşırı zevk alarak oynadığım sayılı oyunlardan biri ve kesinlikle oynamaya değer.  Valve gene yapacağını yapmış ve oyunun devamını getirerek efsaneler arasına PORTAL adını yazdırmış. Oynanış ve senaryoya harika, grafiklerde gelişme var. 1. oyundaki pasta hikayesine nazaran daha fazla çetrefilli diyebilirim :D Tabii ki oynarken gene stratejik zeka sınırlarını zorluyorsunuz. Puzzle çözemeyince arada sinir krizleri geçirilse de genel olarak güzel ve eğlenceliydi. Ayrıca oyun sonunda editör ile kendi puzzle haritalarını yaratıp atölyede yayınlayabiliyor olmak çok güzel. Benim tasarımlarınızı da oynamanızı tavsiye ederim.

Sayısal değerlendirmem:

1.	Kullanıcı Arayüzü: 8/10
2.	Menü: 8/10
3.	Grafikler: 9/10
4.	Hikâye: 10/10
5.	Senaryo: 10/10
6.	Müzikler: 9/10
7.	Sahneler: 8/10
8.	Mekanik: 9/10
9.	SFX: 9/10
10.	Oynanış: 9/10

Toplam: 89/100 (70+/100 oyunları tavsiye ederim.)

Portal 2 is a physics-based puzzle game. Good games of this genre should have a smooth difficulty curve, as well as varied and interesting puzzles. Having pleasant visuals and a nice atmosphere also helps, because if you are going to spend some time in one place figuring out a solution, it might as well look good. Portal 2 has all of those qualities - in abundance!

Puzzle games don't Need to have amazing storylines. Or stellar voice acting. Or a world you want to see more of. Or well-developed, complex characters. But Portal 2 has All of these as well! And for this - for going above and beyond what is required in its genre - I rate it as a masterpiece, and one of the best games I've ever played.

No inicio sério eu achei que o jogo era uma disperdiçio de tempo e que eu não iria gostar e também pensei que não iria rodar Maissss.... O jogo e super otimizado tem uma historia excelente e foi 'o' melhor jogo que eu já joguei na historia chorei com final sim quero continuação clarooo . Bom não tenho muito a dizer apenas super recomendo
The story line blew my mind. It was one of the best games I have ever plays and definatly the best story by far
this game is good as hell
Well. The man with the valve on the back of his head was really the highlight of my experience of the game.
